Create a Password as a backup verification option
Press & hold while reading the paragraph above. MeetSID is a global identity verification and protection solution that gives its users complete control over their identity. Record Your Voice
#titles of pages Sign Up Getting Started Setup Face ID Email Verification Mobile Verification Upload NIC Select Document Type Setup Voice Physical Verification Password Login Setup Password Add Payment Details Confirm Details Face Login Voice Login NIC Passport Congratulation This is a free service provided by Election Commission of Sri Lanka Front of National Identity Card Back of National Identity Card Front of Driver\'s License Back of Driver\'s License National Identity Card Back of National Identity Card Registration Process
Blink Blink\nAgain Smile Turn\nLeft Turn\nRight Upload Retry Hold phone at eye level
#first page Login Sign Up
#intro page What is meetSID
#starting page Take control of your identity MeetSID stores your information on a private blockchain with quantum proof security and gives you, and only you, access to it. Learn more Get Started Take a Tour
#Guide Page Setup Face Identity Follow the gestures on the screen for liveness detection. Setup Voice Identity Tap the record button & read the text on the screen. Select Identity Document You will need a government issued identity document. Scan Document Scan your identity document. Payment Information Purchase your annual subscription for MeetSID\'s identity verification & fraud prevention services.
#success page
#email verification page Verify Resend
#sign up page
#face detection page Hold the camera in-front of your face and make the gestures (e.g. Blink) displayed. Hold phone at eye level
#voice detection page Tap the button and read the text on the screen.\n Tap again to stop recording. Tap to start Tap to stop Tap to play
#doc capture page Capture front of your NIC Front of NIC Take a Photo Take a selfie with the back of your NIC Back of NIC
#driver's license page Capture front of your license Front of License Take a Photo Capture back of your license Back of License
#new nic page Capture front of your NIC Front of NIC Take a Photo Capture back of your NIC Back of NIC
#passcode page Continue This is your backup verification in case of a partial failure in biometric authentication. Download password passcode.txt is saved to external storage
#doc selection page This is the primary identity document for your MeetSID verification. Passport National Identity Card Driverâ€™s License
#user details page Confirm Next Gold Status Dashboard Physical Verification Address Selfie with NIC Back Scan NIC Front NavActivity Place document inside the square and hold still
